snippet: Some schools are giving students the option of designing their own major.
abstract: Some schools are giving students the option of designing their own major.
lead_paragraph: Elizabeth (Coco) Limberakis started reading her mother's romance novels - "the kind with Fabio on the cover" - when she was 11. While bodice-rippers aren't usually the fodder for academic study, Ms. Limberakis chose to earn a degree in "Grand Romantic Gestures."

headline.main: Creating Your Own Major, From 'Keeping It Real' to 'Grand Romantic Gestures'
